data.actual_result: The heading in "Appearance" page is "User settings" in larger font and sub-heading is "appearance" in smaller font which is incorrect
data.expected_result: The heading in "Appearance" page should be "Appearance" and sub-heading should be "user settings" just like it's in any other option
data.short_description: The position of header and sub-header is exchanged in user settings>appearance
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings by clicking the cog icon on the bottom - Click on any option such as "My Account", "Privacy & Safety", "Voice and Video" etc. and notice the heading of the page is "My Account" (for example) while the sub-heading is always "user settings" in smaller font - Now click on the appearance option and notice the heading and sub-heading
